result.title: Can anyone explain the solution that i found for this question or even a better solution if u can??
result.content:
https://www.codechef.com/problems/MXSUBMT

int main() {

ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
int n,m;
cin >> n >> m;
int a[n][m];
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++){
        cin >> a[i][j];
    }
}

ll ans = -10000;
for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++){
        for (int i1 = i; i1 < n; i1 ++){
            for (int j1 = j; j1 < m; j1 ++){
                ll cur = 0;
                for (int k = i; k <= i1; k++){
                    for (int l = j; l <= j1; l++){
                        cur += a[k][l];
                    }
                }
                ans = max(ans,cur);
            }
        }
    }
}
cout << ans << endl;

}
